sentences.sContent: Birds flitted about in the trees above them.
sentences.sCn: 鸟儿在他们头顶的树枝间飞来飞去。

sentences.sContent: She seemed to spend her life flitting from one country to another.
sentences.sCn: 她似乎一生都在各国间辗转。

sentences.sContent: His eyes flitted to his watch.

trans.tranOther: to move lightly or quickly and not stay in one place for very long
